Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "Some people are against them residing in the ARU, but I can't blame them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'There are not just refugees from the Green-Vanostok Line, but also from Central Asia and Western Europe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'I must be clear. The ARU can only feed so many mouths.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'When Babylonia recovered Kyaranta, we sent some of the refugees over there, so they could feed themselves.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'But as the numbers grew, so too did the different opinions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'In the end, the refugees of the Green-Varnostok Line were driven out by other refugees. So, they established a Border Commune somewhere near Kyaranta.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "Even though they are located near Kyaranta, they've been unable to receive sufficient supplies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "We were too busy back then. We didn't have time to settle their issues.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "I was worried that further intervention will force the ARU to supply more resources. Which is why we've always maintained a conservative approach on the matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'As long as there are no bloody conflicts, the ARU will not intervene in the management of refugee settlements.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "We don't want to suppress people, but at the same time, we cannot sacrifice the ARU's vital resources.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "Which is why we've just been ignoring them... There was no other way.", 4: '1'}
